oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Carl Perkins and Ronnie McDowell at the Shreveport Municipal Auditorium (proof)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jordanaires (Musical group); McDowell, Ronnie; Metal photoplates; Perkins, Carl, 1932-1998;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card proof (blue on white) announcing a 40th Anniversary Concert celebrating Elvis Presley, Scotty Moore, and Bill Black's first appearance (October 16, 1954) on the Louisiana Hayride featuring Carl Perkins, Ronnie McDowell, Scotty Moore, D. J. Fontana, and the Jordanaires at the Shreveport Municipal Auditorium on October 16. The poster features the first application of color in a two color card. Poster features metal photoplates of Carl Perkins, Ronnie McDowell, and the Jordanaires and is a proof.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: posters; proofs (prints by function); window cards;
